qbraid.transpiler.CircuitWrapper¶

class CircuitWrapper(circuit, input_qubit_mapping)[source]¶

Abstract class for qbraid circuit wrapper objects.

Note: The circuit wrapper object keeps track of abstract parameters and qubits using an intermediate representation. Qubits are stored simplhy as integers, and abstract parameters are stored as a qbraid.transpiler.parameter.ParamID object, which stores an index in addition to a name. All other objects are transpiled directly when the qbraid.transpiler.CircuitWrapper.transpile() method is called.

instructions¶

list of qbraid.transpiler.instructionwrapper.InstructionWrapper objects

Type

Iterable

moments¶

list of qbraid.transpiler.momentwrapper.MomentWrapper objects, may be none if package does not support moments

Type

Iterable

circuit¶

the underlying circuit object that has been wrapped

qubits¶

list of integers which represent all the qubits in the circuit, typically stored sequentially

Type

List[int]

params¶

(Iterable): list of abstract paramaters in the circuit, stored as qbraid.transpiler.parameter.ParamID objects

num_qubits¶

number of qubits in the circuit

Type

int

input_qubit_mapping¶

dictionary where the keys are qubit objects of the underlying circuit and values are integers which track the qubit identity.

Type

dict

input_param_mapping¶

dictionary where the keys are abstract parameter objects of the underlying circuit and values are qbraid.transpiler.parameter.ParamID objects

Type

dict

package¶

the package with which the underlying circuit was cosntructed

Type

str

__init__(circuit, input_qubit_mapping)[source]¶

Methods

__init__(circuit, input_qubit_mapping)

transpile(package, *args, **kwargs)

Transpile a qbraid quantum circuit wrapper object to quantum circuit object of type

Attributes

circuit

Return the underlying circuit that has been wrapped.

input_param_mapping

Return the input parameter mapping.

input_qubit_mapping

Return the input qubit mapping.

instructions

Return an Iterable of instructions in the circuit.

moments

Return an Iterable of moments in the circuit.

num_clbits

num_qubits

package

Return the original package of the wrapped circuit.

params

Return the circuit parameters.

qubits

Return the qubits acted upon by the operations in this circuit

supported_packages

Return a list of the packages available for transpile.
